news_header: Turkey's drone attacks in Syria have resulted in civilian casualties amid escalating tensions.
news_text: More than 20 civilians have been killed in Syria due to Turkish drone strikes, with reports indicating at least 27 fatalities according to the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights. Turkey has intensified its military actions against Kurdish militants following a terrorist attack in Ankara, which the Turkish government attributes to the PKK. The Syrian Kurdish armed forces report that Turkish airstrikes have targeted not only military checkpoints but also residential areas and energy facilities.
